original: Hörstadius, Nils Wilhelm, civilingenjör, direktör, Borås, f. 25/11/94 i Sthlm av hovr:råd. Wilhelm H. o. Svea Hård af Segerstad. G. 27 m. Margit Bergengren. Barn: Bengt f. 28, EHsabet 31, Ragnar 32. — Stud:ex. i Sthlm 12, civ:ing:ex. v. KTH 18, stud. m. stip. v. The Amos Tuck School of Admin. and Finance i Hannover, N. H., USA, 21-22. Re.s:off:-ex. 16, fänrik i fortif. 16, und:löjtn. 19, löjtn. 22, löjtn. VVK 22, kapt. 30. Ing. h. A-B Vatten’byggn rbyrån i Sthlm 18-20, h. St. Kopparb. Bergsl. A-B v. kraftv :byggn. i Forshuvudfor-sen i Borlänge 20-21, sekr. i Sv:es textilind :förb. i Sthlm 23-25, verkst. dk. i A-B Sv. Konstsidke i Borås 25- 46, verkst. dir. i Borås Wäfveri A-B sed. 47, led. av styr. s:ed. 30, A-B Sv:es Fören. Trikåfäbr. sed. 39, Kdlsunds A-B s€d. 42;, A-B Sv. Konstsiilke sed. 47, Viskans Kraft A-B sed. 47, textilrådet sed. 4’2, ’Stift. Sv. textilforskn. o. Sv. textilforskn linst. i Qbg sed. 43, led. av Sv. Hand |bankens centr:styr. sed. 45, av styr. f. Borås tekn. gymii. o. textiilinst. i Bo-råis sed. 46, ordf. i V aste rgötl. o. n. Hall. Hand :kamm. sed. 47, led. av ’stadsfulllin. sed. 3’1, v. ordf. sed. 44, ordf. i byggn :ndn 40-46, ordf. i lönendn 40, led. av elverksstyr. sed. 40, led. av riksd. första kamm. 37, krigsind :omb. i Älvsb. 1. s. del sed. 44. RVO, RFinlLOlkl, ÖRKHt2kl, SkytteM.
translated: Hörstadius, Nils Wilhelm, civil engineer, director, Borås, b. 25/11/94 in Stockholm to court counsel Wilhelm H. and Svea Hård af Segerstad. Married in 1927 to Margit Bergengren. Children: Bengt b. 28, EHsabet b. 31, Ragnar b. 32. - Studentexamen (university entrance exam) in Stockholm in 1912, Master of Science in Engineering from KTH in 1918, scholarship student at The Amos Tuck School of Admin. and Finance in Hanover, NH, USA, 1921-1922. Reserve officer's exam in 1916, ensign in fortification in 1916, second lieutenant in 1919, lieutenant in 1922, lieutenant in the Reserve in 1922, captain in 1930. Engineer at AB Vattenbyggnadsbyrån in Stockholm 1918-1920, responsible for St. Kopparb. Bergsl. AB on hydropower construction in Forshuvudforsen in Borlänge 1920-1921, secretary of the Swedish Textile Industry Association in Stockholm 1923-1925, executive director of AB Sv. Konstsidke in Borås 1925-1946, executive director of Borås Wäfveri AB since 1947, member of the board since 1930, AB Sv:es Fören. Trikåfäbr. since 1939, Kdlsunds AB since 1942, AB Sv. Konstsiilke since 1947, Viskans Kraft AB since 1947, the Textile Council since 1942, the Swedish Textile Research Foundation and the Swedish Textile Research Institute in Qbg since 1943, member of the board of Swedish Handelsbanken Central Board since 1945, of the board of Borås Technical Gymnasium and Textile Institute in Borås since 1946, chairman of Västergötland and N. Halland Chamber of Commerce since 1947, member of the city council since 1931, vice chairman since 1944, chairman of the building industry 1940-1946, chairman of the wage council 1940, member of the power plant board since 1940, member of the first chamber of Riksdag (parliament) since 1937, member of the war industry committee in Älvsborg county, first part, since 1944. RVO, RFinlLOlkl, ÖRKHt2kl, SkytteM. Note: 'b.' means 'born', and 'since' means 'from'.
